item.description:
Join us Saturday evening for the Patriots game. We can also play poker, billiards, foosball or just chat with new & old friends. Please bring something to share and BYOB. Feel free to bring a friend.
Address (Rt. 135, Mass Pike/495 area) to be sent to those attending.


Check commuter rail to Ashland, arrive 6:50, maybe someone could pick-up.
Commuter rail home, check from Ashland or Framingham, arrange for drop off on someone's way home.
item.how_to_find_us: I will email the address to those who are attending.
item.why: Come and relax, meet new friends. If you are a new member, this is a great way to meet others in the group.

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Patriots game - Private Home Event
